text: Shia LaBeouf Explodes at Bowling Alley'You F * * * ing Racist!!!'Shia LaBeouf Explodes at Bowling Alley,'You F * * * ing Racist!!!'EXCLUSIVE Shia LaBeouf got kicked out of an L. A. bowling alley Wednesday night after freaking out on a bartender, calling him a ` ` f * * * ing racist.'' Shia was at Pinz in Studio City and according to one eyewitness, he was there for 3 hours pounding back beers. We're told Shia got rowdy in Jerry's Deli, which is connected to Pinz, and got into a verbal altercation when the staff told him to leave. We've obtained additional video that shows Shia
